prov:entity.attribute:description: A diagnostic to calculate Lamb weathertypes over a given region. Furthermore, correlations between weathertypes and precipitation patterns over a given are can be calculated and 'combined' or 'simplified' weathertypes can be derived. Additionally, mean fields, as well as anomalies and standard deviations can be plotted.
